article.title: Assembling DocBook articles with a DITA map
article.para: A DITA map can define relationships for content where:

listitem.para: You can create granular, stand-alone content objects.
You can process the content to incorporate the relationships.

article.para: By externalizing the relationships, you can get a better view of the entire information set, more easily maintain the relationships, and reuse content for different purposes with different relationships.
